0.0001 < 1/(nπ) < 0.001  
→ 1000 < nπ < 10000  
→ 1000/π ≈ 318.31 < n < 10000/π ≈ 3183.098

Thus, n ranges from 319 to 3183, giving 3183 - 319 + 1 = 2865 x-intercepts. However, since the interval is open, n=3183 gives x=0.0001, which is excluded. Therefore, n ranges from 319 to 3182, resulting in 3182 - 319 + 1 = 2864 x-intercepts.
